content.raw: I relaxed the bounds for camera pitch and height range, which made it possible to track object that are not near the ground plane (e.g. ufo), so the final pose is slightly different.  But visually tracking is still working.  I'll update the test but it would be great if someone else can confirm tracking is working.  Thanks.
